content: What a wonderful read this second volume of Zaregoto was, insane from start to finish.

Extreme scifi series recommendation that conveys the similar feeling of emergence and suspense of Interstellar. Any medium is fine, but I'd prefer books over VNs. I'm taking a break from those.
Ah it's been so long since I last opened my bwl. How y'all?
Just finished Wheel of Time book 1! Absolutely amazing! Easily my new favorite fantasy series, can't wait to read more.
